name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;; Lumshaw Ocean: the sea famous for its pristine, sparkling ocean water.{w} Although known as a fast route for merchant ships traveling between port towns,{w} trustworthy merchants are not the only sailors on these glistening waves...;;;hint
speak;Emma; And the ocean breeze is so cool!
speak;Emily; It is super pretty!{w} The glimmer in the water is mesmerizing!{w} I can hardly believe this is our first time setting foot on a ship.{w} It sways too much, though{tgm}...
speak;Emma; It just sucks that Mom said I'm up for lookout soon{tgm}...{tgm}{w} Maybe I can talk with everyone to gauge their spirits before joining her.
speak;Emily; You go ahead and do that{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I feel like my breakfast is about to escape my stomach.
speak;Emma; Alright, I've got time to spare!{w} After I talk to my friends, I can go under deck to get ready for lookout!
